title: NF-PIPELINES
description: This repository houses a collection of workflows I have developed over the
course of my PhD. They are typically related to analyses that I needed to carry
out at some point or another. Feel free to try them out, adapt them or even use
them as a guide for your own custom pipelines.

mandatory.title: Mandatory Arguments
mandatory.description: These options MUST be provided to run the pipeline:

outdir.description: Path to the output directory where the results will be saved.

out_prefix.description: Prefix for output files and/or directories.

pipeline.description: Specification of which sub-workflow to run.

nf_arguments.title: Nextflow Arguments
description: These are recommended Nextflow-specific arguments relating to the
execution of Nextflow itself. Notice the use of single hyphens when

profile.description: Which pipeline profiles to use to execute the pipeline.

with-notification.description: Email to send a workflow execution email to - success/failure notification.

cluster.title: Cluster Arguments
cluster.description: Arguments for running jobs on HPC clusters (ignore if '-profile standard'):

partition.description: Which job-queue to submit to submit jobs to.

max_memory.description: Maximum amount of memory that can be requested. DO NOT TOUCH.

max_cpus.description: Maximum number of CPUs that can be requested. DO NOT TOUCH.

max_time.description: Maximum amount of time that can be requested. DO NOT TOUCH.

seqdir.description: Directory path containing paired-end short-read FASTQ files.

krakendb.description: Directory path to pre-installed Kraken2 database.

bq_phred.description: Quality value that a base is qualified. Default phread quality >= 15.

n_base_limit.description: Number of N's in a read before read-pair is removed. Default is 5

average_qual.description: Average quality required by a read to not be filtered out. Default 0 (no minimum avg. quality).

length_required.description: Reads shorter than this length will be discarded. Default is 15.

hifi.description: Directory path containing the HiFi Fastq file/s.

assembly.description: Which genome assembly output to analyses.

hic.description: Directory path containing the Hi-C Fastq files.

busco_db.description: Directory path to a pre-downloaded BUSCO database.

reviewed_assembly.description: Directory path containing the Juicebox-edited assembly files (should contain '<id>.review.assembly' files).

contig.description: Directory path containing the Hifiasm contig output as generated by the 'assembly' pipeline.

filtered_hifi.description: Directory path to adapter-filtered HiFi sequence data generated by the 'assembly' pipeline

assembly.description: Which genome assembly output to analyses.

length.description: Filter scaffolds less than this length.

busco_db.description: Directory path to a pre-downloaded BUSCO database.

msa.description: Directory path to MSA files. Extension must be '.fa' or '.fasta'.

models.description: Which CodeML models to run. Provide as a quoted string separated by spaces.
